titleStmt.title: The brides preparation. By the Lady Eleanor:.
titleStmt.author: Eleanor, Lady, d. 1652.

notesStmt.note: Wing has publication year 1644[5]; Thomason catalogue lists under 1645.
Annotation on Thomason copy: after Eleanor: "Davis"; between March and 1644: "21th".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
